abstract.p: Michael Dolan letter on Mightywondercam that elminates shaky video recording (S)

block.p: ''Camcorders Allow a Steady Shot, Even Without a Steady Hand,'' June 8) deftly illuminates the technology that aims to combat ''shakycam.'' But if you shake a camera, you get shaky images -- and the smaller the camera, the more it shakes. The Steadicam may be too pricey for many shooters, but there is a way to bolster camcorder stability without going broke. A Mightywondercam shoulder brace is available at www.videosmith.com. It is a lightweight, easy-to-use and relatively inexpensive (about $200) way to fight jiggles while shooting on the move.
